Content: Is it actually chrome as in plated with chromium or just the chrome finish? fixing a scratch on mine and because im riding in the winter with salted roads, sanded metal exposed to salt is a no-no. No problem with electroplating (Possibly actual gold plating because the surface area is so small so cost would be cheap)
